Text.Page:
! We've got big problems. Last nightâ€”keep this quiet, all right?

After the mekonaris took the woods and the junction, they blockaded the valley. Dragonfall looked safe, but just now the Watch found a house empty. Whole family snatched. A few bloodstains...and some black feathers.

If word gets out...well, the town's in a panic already.

We have to act! My guild will scout ahead if you can break the blockade. You in?
Well met, <PCCLASS:lcase>! My day is improving!
